login.title: Login required
login.description: You need to be logged in to benefit from this service. If you are not registered, the process only takes a few minutes.
login.smartpassText: SmartPass is your digital credential to access UAE government services
login.uaepassText: UAE Pass is the National Digital Identity solution for the UAE
departmentOfEconomicDevelopment.address: Baniyas Tower, Al Falah Street - Fatima bint Mubarak St 6, Abu Dhabi
default.title: Start Your Business
relatedJourneyDescription: The 'Manage Your Business' journey contains a dashboard for your business owners and representatives to view and...
main.title: Pay Application Fees
main.description: Through this service, you can pay the fees for any service (Licence Issuance, amendment, renewal and cancellation)
label.transactionNumber.description: Please enter a valid transaction number to proceed.
step1.title: Check application
step1.description: Enter your transaction number to check for any fees pending to be paid.
step2.title: Make Payment
step2.description: View the fees summary and make any payments necessary.
step3.title: Application summary
step3.description: View the summary and print the receipt once the payment is made and received
errorMsg.noPendingFees.title: There are no pending fees on this application
errorMsg.noPendingFees.content: This application has no fees pending, please try another reference number
errorMsg.somethingWentWrong.title: Something Went Wrong
errorMsg.somethingWentWrong.content: An error occured while trying to complete your request. Please try again later.
payment.success.title: Your Fees Have Been Paid
payment.success.content: Congratulations! Your fees has been paid. Please print this receipt from the button below to retain a copy for your records.
payment.inProgress.title: Payment in Progress
payment.inProgress.content: Your payment is currenly being processed.
input.information: Ensure to enter the transaction number with the letters and hyphen, followed by the digits
toolTip.desc1: Please enter the transaction number of any licence application,amendment or service to proceed.Please enter a
toolTip.title: Only transaction numbers beginning with TN-/TR-/CN-/CA-/CR-/CC-/AP-/II-/IN-/IA-/IR-/IC-/IO-/IE-/IEA- are valid
form.checkBox.label: Pay by Credit
form.alert.warning: Please review the trade name before you proceed
form.alert.error: Failed to get trade licence details from the DED
notice.economiclicence.pendingPayment.de: Based on your selection, please find your payment summary below. Click 'Pay' to proceed with the payment.
notice.economicName.pendingPayment.title: Payment
notice.economicName.pendingPayment.text: Please find below your payment summary, based on your selections. Click on Pay to proceed with the payment.
notice.paymentSummary.title: Payment summary
tradeName.title: Trade Name
continueProcess.title: You will be redirected shortly
continueProcess.content: Please be patient while we identify your application
